title: Determine Disposition for Non-Conforming Material
description: The Material Review Board (MRB) is meeting to decide the disposition for a batch of non-conforming parts.

tasks.description: Review the details of the Non-Conformance Report (NCR), including the defect description and quantity.
tasks.expected_outcome: MRB team reviews the NCR information.

tasks.description: Analyze the potential impact of the defect and decide on a disposition (e.g., 'Scrap', 'Rework', 'Use-As-Is').
tasks.expected_outcome: The team decides the parts can be reworked to bring them into specification.

tasks.description: Record the disposition in the NCR, provide instructions for the rework, and close the report.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent updates the NCR with the 'Rework' disposition and adds a link to the rework instructions.
